content: this pattern is available as a free ravelry download a quick and easy crochet pattern for a smiski work in spiral skill level easy languages english and spanish you can use any yarn and hook i used cotton yarn la abuelita and crochet hook 2 mm follow me on instagram @marsigurumi https //www instagram com/marsigurumi/ made by marsigurumi in 2025 https //www instagram com/p/df9bq4jj7u4/ img_index=1
